messages.subject: Fwd:  Re: What is Kyo really?
messages.msgSnippet: ... -Wow! What a show! Glad that WAM has started both it and SaiYuki Reload over again (8Am/4PM/2AM ETs). How many animes have actual historical figures in
messages.messageBody:
--- In animeontv@yahoogroups.com, "keiman0" <KeimanZero@...> wrote:

-Wow! What a show! Glad that WAM has started both it and SaiYuki
Reload over again (8Am/4PM/2AM ETs). How many animes have actual
historical figures in them? I can think of a few like Rurouni
Kenshin/Samurai X; Hellsing; SaiYuki/SYR; Read or Die and the new one
COD/Cutting Edge/AnimeNetwork/Le Chevalier D'Eon. The last one is set
at the time of the French revolts (1790s) and includes the title
character, the Royals, Duc d'Orleans (baddie) and a few others. Kyo
has lots like Nobunaga, Yukimura Sanada (what a family!) and Saito
Hajime (ancestor of his namesake who was Captain of the third squad
of the Shinsengumi featured in RK as well as Peacemaker). In
Peacemaker Saito is cast as a ghost seer who can see the dead souls
much like Ichigo in Bleach can. Well more soon. Have a cool day and
Kami bless you all. Toodles-K&K


-- In animeontv@yahoogroups.com, "keiman0" <KeimanZero@> wrote:
>
> The Mibu Clan now seem to be like the 'Soldats' group from 'NOIR'
in
> their ruthlessness and ambitions. No special 'assassins' though
like
> Kiri and Mirieille yet. Only three eppys to go. Toodles-K&K
>
>
> --- In animeontv@yahoogroups.com, "keiman0" <KeimanZero@> wrote:
> >
> > -After last night's eppy and listening to Hokaru- is Kyo perhaps
an
> > alchemist himself? After all, he split his soul and expelled half
> of it
> > from his body according to Hokaru. Toodles-K&K
> >
> > -- In animeontv@yahoogroups.com, "keiman0" <KeimanZero@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Samurai Deeper Kyo- After seeing Machine Dolls last night and
> hearing
> > > that Kyo was a 'plaything or toy' I conclude that the Mibu Clan
> built
> > a
> > > chimera or kimera like the ones created by Tucker and other
> > alchemists
> > > in Fullmetal Alchemist. The other possibility is a golum but
they
> > have
> > > no hearts and the dolls did. Wonder if Kyo and the dolls were
the
> > only
> > > ones? Kami bless and toodles-K&K
> > >
> >
>

--- End forwarded message ---
